Package Automata

Class Automaton

  • java.lang.Object
    • Automata.Automaton
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Automaton1Dim, Automaton2Dim

    public abstract class Automaton
extends java.lang.Object

The base class for every automaton. Implements the main state changing mechanism in nextState method
which implements abstract getChanges method which is unique for every type of automaton.

    • Field Detail

      • cells

        protected java.util.HashMap<CellCoordinates,CellState> cells

To keep the information about cells belonging to the automaton and their state.

      • mode

        protected java.lang.String mode

In some automata to keep some details about it. Ex. what rule is the 1-dimensional automaton.
In other automata it's ignored.

[More experienced programmer would keep it in some children of this class
so the memory is never wasted.]

    • Constructor Detail

      • Automaton

        public Automaton​()

    • Method Detail

      • insertMap

        protected void insertMap​(java.util.HashMap<? extends CellCoordinates,? extends CellState> map)

Sets the "cells" field

      • insertNeighborStrategy

        protected void insertNeighborStrategy​(CellNeighborhood neighbors)

Sets the private "neighborsStrategy" field.

      • setMode

        protected void setMode​(java.lang.String actualmode)

Sets the "mode" field

      • getCells

        public java.util.HashMap<CellCoordinates,CellState> getCells​()

Returns the "cells" field.

      • getChanges

        protected abstract CellState getChanges​(java.util.ArrayList<CellCoordinates> coords)

Unique for every type of automaton. Gets the neighbors of a cell, returns the state of the cell in the next step.

      • nextState

        public java.util.HashMap<CellCoordinates,CellState> nextState​()

Called once for every step. Changes the state of the automaton and returns changes
so they can be shown on the screen (other method responsible for drawing)
